author: rgardler
msg: Add warning about imminent change to identifying the source documents location.

author: rgardler
msg: Provide pre and post filters and allow the tretrieval of unprocessed content. Add warning that the source format will later change to the daisy XML document rather than the HTML document it currently is.

author: tomdz
msg: Minor fixes and enhancements to the new Ant tasks

author: gdamour
msg: o update LightweightTypeInfoBuilder to mirror what HeavyweightTypeInfoBuilder
is doing for description of arrays.
o if the type of a ParameterDesc is an element mapped to a simple type,
then the element needs to be registered by the type system.
o clean-up the way serializer/deserializer are retrieved.
o rely on axis to retrieve the serializer/deserializer pairs for
a given Java type and XML type.
